conditions.name: Migraine
conditions.suggestion: Rest in dark room. Common tablets: Sumatriptan (50-100mg) or Rizatriptan (10mg) for acute relief, Propranolol (40mg) for prevention, Ondansetron (4mg) for nausea. Identify and avoid triggers.

conditions.name: Epilepsy
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Levetiracetam (500-1000mg), Carbamazepine (200mg), or Valproic acid (500mg) as anticonvulsants. Take medications regularly, avoid triggers, maintain regular sleep schedule, wear medical ID.

conditions.name: Multiple Sclerosis
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Fingolimod (0.5mg daily), Dimethyl fumarate (240mg twice daily), Teriflunomide (14mg daily) for disease modification. Baclofen (10mg) for muscle spasticity. Physical therapy, occupational therapy, stress management essential.
